hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Kak Anju as Child: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #the Sun's Song#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the path to #the Tower#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Deku Shield#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: Use Multiworld to cross the gaps between worlds and engage in jolly co-operation!

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #the Song of Time#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that ##the Fire Temple## has #4# major items.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Hover Boots#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides the #Treasure Box Shop#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #under the icy waters# lies #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Haunted Wasteland## has #0# major items.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Minuet of Forest#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Mask of Truth# yields #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the path to #the Tower#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Nocturne of Shadow# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Deku Shield#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Heart Container# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Hover Boots#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Purple Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that ##Kokiri Forest## has #1# major item.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Purple Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers a #Slingshot Shooting Gallery#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #a Game Key# can be found in #the Market#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Minuet of Forest#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Red Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #a Hookshot# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that plundering #Zora's River# is a foolish choice.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple After Wind Enemy Chest

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #the Bunny Hood#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Hammer Room Clear Chest

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path to #Phantom Ganon#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: Why are you asking me? I don't have any answers! I'm just as confused as you are!
